info.name: Partners API
info.description:
## Pre-Requisites **Receive** these from Perkd: 1. Merchant specific **`x-api-key`** to authenticate API Calls 2. Merchant specific **Digital Card** on Perkd app to test with **Provide** these to Perkd: 1. Universal **`callback endpoint`** to receive the API response 2. List of unique **`machineIDs`**, their location details & IP addresses for whitelisting > **Note**: A Perkd representative shall assist the above ## Host Host used depends on the App you're testing with. You'll need different **`x-api-key`** for the different environments, even if its for the same Merchant. | APP | LIVE APP | TEST APP | | --- | --- | --- | | HOST | [https://api.perkd.io/prod](https://api.perkd.io/prod) | [https://api.perkd.io/test](https://api.perkd.io/test) | | Where to install | [App Store
GooglePlay Store](https://perkd.me/app) | Private Install Link provided by Perkd's staff |

item.name: Actions
Vending

query.description:
`string`

Unique identifier of the vending machine

`string`

An optional reference identifier for the action (i.e. sessionId)

`string`

Unique identifier of the vending machine

`objArray`

List of items selected by customer
> Refer to [Item Object](#c69abff7-186f-4d5f-9d91-ae2236cb662b)

`string`

An optional reference identifier for the action (ie: orderId)

`string`
Unique identifier of the vending machine

`objArray`

List of items selected by customer
> Refer to [Item Object](#c69abff7-186f-4d5f-9d91-ae2236cb662b)

`string`

for pickups of items purchased in-app. Retrieved from check-in action

`string`

An optional reference identifier for the action (ie: redemptionId)

`string`

Unique identifier of the vending machine

`string`

An optional reference identifier for the action (ie: transactionId)

`boolen`

Default true. Set to ***false*** to manually capture payment with [Pay Commit](#18789674-6f3f3971-bfe3-43fa-a4e9-2d4b2ab71bd8)

`string`

Unique identifier of the vending machine

`string`

An optional reference identifier for the action (ie: transactionId)

item.description:
Action QR generation for Check In, Order, Pickup & Pay at Vending Machine

\* - required fields

query.description:
`string`

Unique identifier of the self-service kiosk

`objArray`

List of items selected by customer
> Refer to [Item Object](#c69abff7-186f-4d5f-9d91-ae2236cb662b)

`string`

An optional reference identifier for the action

item.description: **Actions** are predefined sets of commands or requests that trigger specific tasks or interactions within [Perkd Wallet app](https://)**.** An action url generated: - Can be presented as **QR Codes or NFC Tags** - Default validity is **1 hour** > **SUPPORTED ACTIONS** | Actions | Descriptions | Machine Supported | | --- | --- | --- | | **Check In** | For checking into machine location. Used before "**Order Action**" to identify the customer. | Vending, Kiosk | | **Order** | Initiate an Order Check-out process after customer picked out items on the machine. | Vending, Kiosk | | **Pay** | For collecting / authorising payments at the machine. Eg: Pay for parking tickets. | Vending, Kiosk | | **Pickup** | For Sample Redemptions, or Self-Pickup orders placed off-machine. | Vending |

item.name: Callbacks

query.description:
`objArray`

> Items redeemable / collectable at this machine. Refer to [Item Object](#662d1b4a-6ffe-4311-8f71-04397088ff30)

`string`

Echoed from referenceId used to generate check-in QR

`string`

Carried over from Order Action QR generated

`string`

Carried over from Pick Up Action QR generated

`integer`

The sum of all line item prices, taxes, and fees. Must be positive.

`string`

Three-letter [ISO 4217](https://www.iso.org/iso-4217-currency-codes.html) currency code, in all capital letters.

`string`

Carried over from Pay Action QR generated

`string`

Three-letter [ISO 4217](https://www.iso.org/iso-4217-currency-codes.html) currency code, in all capital letters.

`string`

Carried over from Pay Action QR generated

item.description: Each [Action]() is paired with a corresponding Callback endpoint that transmits data back to your machine server whenever user interacted / completed the Action. > Note: Ensure all MachineIds registered are **Universally Unique** as each callback is specific to the machine it originates from. The callback mechanism maintains a persistent retry process until it receives a successful response with a **`status code 200`**

item.name: Objects Schema

query.description:
`integer`

Sum of all line item prices, discounts, taxes, and fees in the local currency. Must be positive.

`integer`

Calculated tax amount based on Merchant's [Regional Tax Policy](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/taxes).

`string`

[Stock Keeping Unit](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/details/sku) - **Unique Identifier** that match with Shopify Variant SKU

`integer` 

Unit price of product or services, up to 3 decimal points.

`array`

Product images URL. Only support unencrypted publicly hosted resources.

`integer`

**Default as 1**. Must NOT exceed Inventory value

`integer`

Stocks available on Machine. Used for quantity validation if provided.

response.name: Item with Options

query.description:
`string`

Display name, eg: Temperature, Size, Color

`boolean`

default FALSE. will pre-select if TRUE

`string`

UI component
radioboxList | checkboxList | tagList | quantityList | switchList | carousel | slider | input

`string`

display name, eg: Blue, L, Heat Up

`boolean`

default FALSE. will pre-select if TRUE

`integer`

Membership tier level. Greater number represents higher tiers

item.description:
Model definition that outlines the properties, attributes, rules, and relationships of the **Objects** **Data**.

**Objects** are standardised across API Request, Response and Callback payload.

item.name: Machine [wip]
item.description:
For machines to receive following events for data syncing:  
1\. Product Create, Update, Delete  
2\. Location Create
